      • addTask

        @RequestMapping(value="/addTask",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addTask(@RequestParam(value="content",required=true)
                                      java.lang.String content,
                                      @RequestParam(value="desc")
                                      java.lang.String desc,
                                      @RequestParam(value="priority")
                                      byte priority,
                                      @RequestParam(value="isHabit")
                                      byte isHabit,
                                      @RequestParam(value="beginTimeExpected")
                                      java.util.Date beginTimeExpected,
                                      @RequestParam(value="endTimeExpected")
                                      java.util.Date endTimeExpected,
                                      @RequestParam(value="beginTimeActual")
                                      java.util.Date beginTimeActual,
                                      @RequestParam(value="endTimeActual")
                                      java.util.Date endTimeActual,
                                      @RequestParam(value="isComplete")
                                      byte isComplete)
